Original:
Shaka Lounge Bar 是一個極具魅力的休閒場所，氛圍非常放鬆舒適。作為一間位於精華區安和路二段23巷的酒吧，Shaka 給人的第一印象是其獨特的裝潢，從牆上的熱帶植物到暖色調的燈光設計，都營造出了一種度假般的氛圍。酒吧的飲品選擇豐富，不僅提供經典雞尾酒，還有特色的手工調酒，尤其是他們的招牌莫吉托，充滿清新的薄荷香味，讓人耳目一新。

服務方面，酒吧的工作人員友善且專業，總是能夠根據客人的喜好推薦適合的飲品。即使在繁忙的時段，他們也能保持快速且有禮貌的服務，這點讓人印象深刻。Shaka 也經常舉辦現場音樂表演，讓人可以一邊享受音樂，一邊品嚐美酒，這樣的體驗非常放鬆。

唯一稍微不足的地方是有時候人多會有些擁擠，尤其是周末晚上，但這也從側面證明了這裡的受歡迎程度。總的來說，Shaka Lounge Bar 是一個很值得一去的場所，不論是與朋友聚會，還是想要獨自放鬆，這裡都能提供一個理想的氛圍。
EN:
Shaka Lounge Bar is a attractive leisure place, and the atmosphere is very relaxed and comfortable.As a bar located in Lane 23, Anhe Road, Essence District, Shaka's first impression is its unique decoration. From the tropical plants on the wall to the warm -colored lighting design, it has created a vacation like a vacation. The atmosphere.Bar drinks are rich in drinking, not only providing classic cocktails, but also special handmade bartending, especially their signature Mogito, full of fresh mint flavor, making people refreshing.

In terms of services, the staff of the bar are friendly and professional, and they can always recommend suitable drinks according to the preferences of the guests.Even in the busy period, they can maintain fast and polite service, which is impressive.Shaka also often holds on -site music performances, allowing people to enjoy the music while enjoying the wine. This experience is very relaxed.

The only slightly lacking place is that sometimes there are many crowded people, especially on weekends and nights, but this also proves the popularity here.In general, Shaka Lounge Bar is a very worthwhile place. Whether it is a party with friends or to relax alone, it can provide an ideal atmosphere here.

Original: 連來了兩次才有時間一定要來評論，要酒精和沒有酒精都有特調，非常好喝也很漂亮可以拍照，調出來的作品都讓人喜歡和適合，吧台很高雅，是我喜歡的裝潢，調酒師都很懂酒也很會適時的和我們互動和分享，是開心的地方會一直想來的地方。
EN: After two times, I have time to comment. It is special for alcohol and no alcohol. It is very delicious and beautiful. The decoration, the bartender knows that wine is also very timely interacting and sharing with us. It is a place where you will always come to think.

Original: 這裡的每一種肉都嫩到一個讓人懷疑人生，整塊的菲力、滷味的嘴邊肉、還有雞胸肉都嫩到吃第一口的時候會懷疑自己到底是吃到什麼肉！火焰胡椒蝦淋的居然是泥煤威士忌，和海味極為搭配的淡淡泥煤香，簡直是藝術。酒吧的餐點比Fine Dinning還厲害，老闆的品味真的很厲害👍。
EN: Every kind of meat here is so tender that it makes people doubt life. The whole piece of Fili, the meat on the mouth of the loquat, and the chicken breasts are so tender that when they eat the first bite, they will doubt what kind of meat they eat!Flame pepper shrimp pouring is actually muddy whiskey, which is extremely matched with seafood, which is simply art.The meal of the bar is more powerful than Fine Dinning, and the taste of the boss is really amazing.

Original:
◎氣氛和音樂節奏很chill絕對值5⭐️，不論一樓還是樓下座位都很寬敞好坐，是一間不論少少人或是一大群人聊天都適合的酒吧！
◎調酒的部分給4⭐️，種類不是很多，但是喝起來都很均衡，琴酒偏少，威士忌比較多，無酒精有茶、咖啡、可樂、果汁只有葡萄柚汁、柳橙汁和檸檬汁，或是要請bartender特調。
◎食物給5⭐️，炒飯大推！義大利麵、滷味、薯條也好吃，牛肉麵和芝麻葉小卷還好。
◎服務的部分4⭐️吧台沒話說，不過昨天我們在B1包廂的桌次比較多，上餐和酒都等好久，另一個優點是有提供開水。
EN:
◎ The atmosphere and music rhythm are very good. The absolute value is 5⭐️. Both the first floor and downstairs are spacious and easy to sit.
◎ The bartending part is given 4 种️, there are not many types, but they are very balanced. There are fewer piano wine, there are many whiskey, no alcoholic tea, coffee, cola, fruit juice, only grapefruit juice, orange juice and lemon juice. Or please ask Bartender special.
◎ Give the food 5 ️, push fried rice!It is also delicious for pasta, loquat, fries, and small rolls of beef noodles and sesame leaves.
◎ The service part of the service has nothing to say, but yesterday we had a lot of tables in B1 box yesterday, and it took a long time for meals and wine. Another advantage is that it provides boiling water.

Original:
我來到這家餐廳，品味了他們的白酒蛤蠣麵和牛肉麵，不得不說味道真的很美味。白酒蛤蠣麵帶著海鮮的鮮甜，搭配著蛤蠣的鮮美，味道相當獨特。這樣的風味絕對能夠滿足美食愛好者的味蕾，讓人愛不釋手。

另外，牛肉麵的美味也不容忽視。牛肉麵作為台灣的經典美食之一，這家餐廳的版本確實不負所望。牛肉的質地嫩滑，湯底濃郁，每一口都是一種極具滿足感的味道。

同時，你提到的酒品水準也在之上，這讓整個用餐體驗更加完美。一杯好的酒能夠提升用餐的樂趣，與美食搭配得宜，確實是一種享受。

總之，這家餐廳的白酒蛤蠣麵和牛肉麵都令人驚艷，酒品水準也讓人印象深刻。這是一個值得多次光臨的美食之地，希望未來還有機會再次品味他們的精彩料理。
EN:
I came to this restaurant and tasted their liquor oyster noodles and beef noodles. I have to say that the taste is really delicious.The white wine oyster noodles are with the sweetness of seafood, with the deliciousness of the oysters, and the taste is quite unique.Such flavors can definitely satisfy the taste buds of food lovers and make people love it.

In addition, the deliciousness of beef noodles cannot be ignored.Beef noodles are one of the classic food in Taiwan, and the version of this restaurant is indeed involved.The texture of the beef is tender and smooth, and the soup base is strong. Each bite is a very satisfying taste.

At the same time, the level of wine you mentioned is also above, which makes the entire dining experience more perfect.A glass of good wine can enhance the fun of dining, and it is indeed a enjoyment with food.

In short, this restaurant's white wine oyster noodles and beef noodles are amazing, and the level of wine is also impressive.This is a place worth visiting many times. I hope there will be a chance to taste their wonderful dishes in the future.

Original: 我們偶然發現了這個地方，並被它的外觀迷住了，所以我們決定去看看。最初，我們計劃只喝一杯，但在喝完第一杯雞尾酒後，我們知道我們必須再點三杯。我們參觀過世界各地的酒吧——紐約、多倫多、墨西哥城、羅馬——但這家酒吧是我們最喜歡的體驗之一。與調酒師交談很愉快，服務也很棒。我們喜歡這種氛圍；每個人都很友善。我們一定會向我們的朋友推薦這個地方，並期待在下次台北之旅中再次光臨。這些飲料非常棒，很明顯調酒師非常仔細地解釋每一種飲料，展現了他的熱情和技巧。非常感謝您帶來的美好體驗！
EN: We accidentally discovered this place and was fascinated by its appearance, so we decided to see it.Initially, we planned to drink only one cup, but after drinking the first cocktail, we knew we had to order another three cups.We visited bars around the world -New York, Toronto, Mexico, Rome -but this bar is one of our favorite experiences.It is very happy to talk to the bartender and the service is great.We like this atmosphere; everyone is friendly.We will definitely recommend this place to our friends and look forward to visiting again next time in Taipei.These drinks are very good, and it is clear that the bartender explains every kind of drink very carefully, showing his enthusiasm and skills.Thank you very much for your beautiful experience!

After listening to our requests, we recommended different cocktails to us.I like the shot of Hojicha very much!
